metadata.title: Ensure Latest SQL Server Service Packs and Hotfixes are Installed
metadata.description: Ensure Latest SQL Server Service Packs and Hotfixes are Installed

metadata.title: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'CLR Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'CLR Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'

metadata.title: Ensure SQL Server is configured to use non-standard ports
metadata.description: Ensure SQL Server is configured to use non-standard ports

metadata.title: Ensure 'Hide Instance' option is set to 'Yes' for Production SQL Server instances
metadata.description: Ensure 'Hide Instance' option is set to 'Yes' for Production SQL Server instances

metadata.title: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account is set to 'Disabled'
metadata.description: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account has been renamed
metadata.description: Ensure the 'sa' Login Account has been renamed

metadata.title: Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'AUTO_CLOSE' is set to 'OFF' on contained databases
metadata.description: Ensure 'AUTO_CLOSE' is set to 'OFF' on contained databases

metadata.title: Ensure no login exists with the name 'sa'
metadata.description: Ensure no login exists with the name 'sa'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Server Authentication' Property is set to 'Windows Authentication Mode'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Server Authentication' Property is set to 'Windows Authentication Mode'

metadata.title: Ensure CONNECT permissions on the 'guest' user is Revoked within all SQL Server databases excluding the master, msdb and tempdb
metadata.description: Ensure CONNECT permissions on the 'guest' user is Revoked within all SQL Server databases excluding the master, msdb and tempdb

metadata.title: Ensure 'Orphaned Users' are Dropped From SQL Server Databases
metadata.description: Ensure 'Orphaned Users' are Dropped From SQL Server Databases

metadata.title: Ensure SQL Authentication is not used in contained databases
metadata.description: Ensure SQL Authentication is not used in contained databases

metadata.title: Ensure only the default permissions specified by Microsoft are granted to the public server role
metadata.description: Ensure only the default permissions specified by Microsoft are granted to the public server role

metadata.title: Ensure Windows BUILTIN groups are not SQL Logins
metadata.description: Ensure Windows BUILTIN groups are not SQL Logins

metadata.title: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
metadata.description: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins

metadata.title: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
metadata.description: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies

metadata.title: Ensure 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins Within the Sysadmin Role
metadata.description: Ensure 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins Within the Sysadmin Role

metadata.title: Ensure 'CHECK_POLICY' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins
metadata.description: Ensure 'CHECK_POLICY' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins

metadata.title: Ensure 'Maximum number of error log files' is set to greater than or equal to '12'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Maximum number of error log files' is set to greater than or equal to '12'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Login Auditing' is set to 'failed logins'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Login Auditing' is set to 'failed logins'

metadata.title: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'
metadata.description: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'

metadata.title: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'
metadata.description: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'

metadata.title: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'
metadata.description: Ensure 'SQL Server Audit' is set to capture both 'failed' and 'successful logins'

metadata.title: Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies
metadata.description: Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies

metadata.title: Ensure 'Symmetric Key encryption algorithm' is set to 'AES_128' or higher in non-system databases
metadata.description: Ensure 'Symmetric Key encryption algorithm' is set to 'AES_128' or higher in non-system databases

metadata.title: Ensure Asymmetric Key Size is set to 'greater than or equal to 2048' in non-system databases
metadata.description: Ensure Asymmetric Key Size is set to 'greater than or equal to 2048' in non-system databases

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') as result

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'clr enabled';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'cross db ownership chaining';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Database Mail XPs';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ole Automation Procedures';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_configured is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_in_use is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote admin connections' AND SERVERPROPERTY('IsClustered') = 0;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_configured is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_in_use is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE is_trustworthy_on = 1 AND name != 'msdb';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib\Tcp\IPAll', N'TcpPort'; END

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Hide Instance option is 1
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread @rootkey = N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', @key = N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib', @value_name = N'HideInstance'; END

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name, is_disabled FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure sid 0x01 is not named sa
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_configured is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'xp_cmdshell';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure auto_close is off for contained databases
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.databases WHERE containment <> 0 and is_auto_close_on = 1;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no login exists with the name sa
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals WHERE L.name = 'sa';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('IsIntegratedSecurityOnly') as login_mode";"

sql57_object.comment: Ensure guest user does not have Connect permission in user databases
sql57_object.sql: EXEC master.sys.sp_MSforeachdb 'USE [?];SELECT DB_NAME() AS DatabaseName FROM sys.database_permissions WHERE [grantee_principal_id] = DATABASE_PRINCIPAL_ID(''guest'') AND [state_desc] LIKE ''GRANT%'' AND [permission_name] = ''CONNECT'' AND DB_NAME() NOT IN (''master'',''tempdb'',''msdb'');'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no database users are orphaned
sql57_object.sql: EXEC sp_MSforeachdb 'USE [?];EXEC sp_change_users_login @Action=''Report'';'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure SQL Authentication is not used in contained databases
sql57_object.sql: EXEC master.sys.sp_MSforeachdb 'USE [?];SELECT name FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name NOT IN (''dbo'',''Information_Schema'',''sys'',''guest'') AND type IN (''U'',''S'',''G'') AND authentication_type = 2;'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no extra permissions granted to public
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM master.sys.server_permissions WHERE (grantee_principal_id = SUSER_SID(N'public') and state_desc LIKE 'GRANT%') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'VIEW ANY DATABASE' and class_desc = 'SERVER') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 2) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 3) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 4) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 5);

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no Builtin groups are logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.principal_id = pe.grantee_principal_id WHERE pr.name like 'BUILTIN%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.[principal_id] = pe.[grantee_principal_id] WHERE pr.[type_desc] = 'WINDOWS_GROUP' AND pr.[name] like CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('MachineName') AS nvarchar) + '%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM dbo.sysproxylogin spl JOIN sys.database_principals dp ON dp.sid = spl.sid JOIN sysproxies sp ON sp.proxy_id = spl.proxy_id WHERE principal_id = USER_ID('public');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Check_Expiration is ON for High Privilege Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l WHERE IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin',name) = 1 AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l JOIN sys.server_permissions AS p ON l.principal_id = p.grantee_principal_id WHERE p.type = 'CL' AND p.state IN ('G', 'W') AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Check_Policy is ON for all SQL Authenticated Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE is_policy_checked = 0;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer', N'NumErrorLogs'; END

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_configured is set to 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure value_in_use is set to 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure audit level is failure or all
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN exec xp_loginconfig 'audit level'; END

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Audit_Change_Group is part of an audit
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'CNAU' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Successful_Login_Group is part of an audit
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'LGSD' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Failed_Login_Group is part of an audit
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'LGFL' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';

sql57_object.comment: No Title
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name, permission_set_desc FROM sys.assemblies where is_user_defined = 1;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Symmetric Key encryption algorithm is set to AES_128 or higher in non-system databases
sql57_object.sql: EXEC master.sys.sp_MSforeachdb 'USE [?];SELECT db_name() AS Database_Name FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE algorithm_desc NOT IN (''AES_128'',''AES_192'',''AES_256'') AND db_id() > 4;'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Asymmetric Key Size is set to greater than or equal to 2048 in non-system databases
sql57_object.sql: EXEC master.sys.sp_MSforeachdb 'USE [?];SELECT 1 FROM sys.asymmetric_keys WHERE key_length < 2048 AND db_id() > 4;'

sql57_state.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named sa
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
Ensure audit level is failure or all

external_variable.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named sa
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
Ensure audit level is failure or all
